title: In case anyone is ever in the market for strange and cheerful...
content:
In case anyone is ever in the market for strange and cheerful custom rugs, I enthusiastically recommend Opal Rugs, handmade by the New Mexico-based Alyse Ronayne. (And hereâ€™s her website.) We have two, and they are gorgeous!
